objectTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the object type.

pluralLabel.description: The plural form label for the object type.

singularLabel.description: The singular form label for the object type.

limit.description: The maximum number of associations allowed for records.

totalRecordsAtLimit.description: The total number of records that have reached their association limit.

totalRecordsNearLimit.description: The total number of records that are approaching their association limit.

objectTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the object type.

pluralLabel.description: The plural form of the label for the object type.

singularLabel.description: The singular form of the label for the object type.

usage.description: The number of records used for the object type.

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

allLabels.description: A list of all association labels.

limit.description: The maximum number of association labels allowed.

percentage.description: The percentage of the association label limit that has been used.

usage.description: The current number of association labels used.

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

overallLimit.description: The total limit for custom properties across all objects.

overallPercentage.description: The percentage of the overall custom property limit that has been used.

overallUsage.description: The total number of custom properties currently in use across all objects.

overallLimit.description: The maximum number of custom object records allowed.

overallPercentage.description: The percentage of the overall custom object record limit that has been used.

overallUsage.description: The total number of custom object records currently in use.

label.description: The label associated with a record that is at its limit.

objectId.description: The objectId of the object that is at its limit.

hasRecordsAtLimit.description: Indicates whether there are records that have reached the association limit.

hasRecordsNearLimit.description: Indicates whether there are records that are approaching the association limit.

pluralLabel.description: The plural form of the label for the object type.

singularLabel.description: The singular form of the label for the object type.

overallLimit.description: The maximum number of calculated properties allowed.

overallPercentage.description: The percentage of the overall limit that is currently being used for calculated properties.

overallUsage.description: The total number of calculated properties currently in use.

limit.description: The maximum number of custom objects allowed.

percentage.description: The percentage of the custom object limit that is currently used.

usage.description: The current number of custom objects used.

percentage.description: The percentage of the limit that has been used.

singularLabel.description: The singular label for the object type.

usage.description: The current usage count for the object type.
